DOC.detailed_description: It interventional prospective study . The study ass intervention `` Therapeutic Education Patient ( TEP ) '' quality life asthmatic child . The patient enrol 1st May 2016 31st December 2016 outpatient clinic Pediatric Allergology & Pulmonology ( PAP ) Respiratory Disease Research Center ( RDRC ) within Institute Biomedicine Molecular Immunology ( IBIM ) National Research Council ( CNR ) Palermo ( RDRC-IBIM CNR ) , Italy . 25 Case Patients follow Therapeutic Education Patient ( TEP ) 25 Control Patients follow usual care program . The following procedure perform : - Pediatric Asthma Quality Life Questionnaire ( PAQLQ ) ; - Children Asthma Control Test ( C-ACT ) ; - Pediatric Caregiver Asthma Quality Life Questionnaire ( PCAQLQ ) ; - Familiar Empowerment Scale ( FES ) ; - Functional respiratory test : force expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) , force expiratory flow 25 % 75 % ( FEF 25-75 ) , force vital capacity ( FVC ) Peak expiratory flow ( PEF ) ; addition , FEV1 PEF daily record SmartOne device ( Medical International Research s.r.l . ) , portable flow peak meter smartphones ; - Evaluation presence Cotinine Nicotine Hair Urine analysis respectively ; - Evaluation level exposure Volatile Organic Compounds ( VOC ) urine analysis .
